title: When we hit 'play again'...
body: Can we have the roles we picked previously already selected? It's not a big thing, but it's mildly irritating to have to select them again after each game.

replies.body:
I think it just needs to be more visually obvious that the client is waiting for you to pick roles. 

Put an animated question-mark in as the placeholder instead of that grey diamond.
Honestly, I've had enough games with friends were we've changed roles that this might end up being irritating rather than helpful. Maybe if it was a toggleable option or something
I'm shocked the select isn't buggier than it is as it is. If they added a tracker like that, I'm sure it would somehow break the client {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
